items: Only registered students of FUPRE can join the club. (Non-fuprites can also join the club by admin approval.)
Players must complete registration before participating in official events.
Club tournaments follow FIDE guidelines unless stated otherwise.
Players must arrive 10 minutes before the round starts.
Pairings will be done using the Swiss system unless otherwise specified.
Non-fuprites may participate in open events, except FCC & FCM.
Standard games use 15+10 (15 minutes with 10s increment).
Blitz events use 3+2.
Engine assistance is strictly prohibited.
Unsportsmanlike behavior may lead to disqualification.
Win = 1 point
Draw = 0.5 point
Loss = 0 points
Scoring systems may vary for specific tournaments.
Ratings are updated after every approved match.
New players start with a provisional rating of 1200.
Respect opponents and arbiters at all times.
No abusive language, gestures, or intimidation.
Follow arbiter instructions promptly.
The FCC is the club’s most prestigious annual event.
Winner of FCM goes on to challenge the FCC champion.(Rapid Championship)
Open to all fupre chess players.(Blitz Championship)
Games are Rapid format (30+30).(Rapid Championship)
Games are Blitz format (3+2).(Blitz Championship)
Tie-breaks decided by 2 game Armegedon.
Winner holds the FCC title for one year.
The FCM is an event featuring 8 players.
Douoble Round-robin format will be used.
Time control: Rapid 15+30.
Tie-breaks decided by Blitz playoffs.
The FCL is a season-long competition.
Matches are played weekly over 2 months.
Points: Match win = 3 pts, Draw = 1 pt, Loss = 0 pts.
